result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: 6. Diggah Yallih Aayoota yengeddeeh Nabii Mucammad ﷺ nubuwwannu dirabboyse mari, Nabiyow ato yallih Digaalak ken mesissam Kee hinnay meesiise waytam kenil inkittu usun Atu kennih luk temeetem manummaysan.
